summary: A replacement for facial texture of Mature Skin
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/aenfelniir.png[/img]


[center][size=2][color=#fff2cc][i]Aen Felniir means " People of the Winter" , loosely translated[/i][/color][/size]
[i][u]I added this due to several people requesting it. [/u]

[/i][/center][center][size=3][color=#b6d7a8]I love the Witcher 3 game, they make females look gorgeous yet still human. So I tried to mimic how it looks.
This is a 2k facial texture for Mature skin, I love the skin a lot just this is my personal remake of it I decided to share.
It comes with the facial skin and a own specular map I made.Â  So it will replace only two files in Mature skin.
[color=#ffe599][u]No part of my skin was copied from the Witcher games.[/u][/color][/color]



[color=#ead1dc][b][size=5]FAQ:
[/size][/b][/color]
[b]Q: It gives my character a neckseam[/b]
A: You must install Mature skin prior to installing this one, and uninstall other other skins.

[b]Q: What difference is it between Mature and yours?[/b]
A: Huge difference, mature skin is still awesome. Well it Adds new lips. Is not a simple altering of Mature skin face, I used the neck and up to the chin on the original. The face region is completely different.

[b]Q: Can you share uncompressed version of the skin?[/b]
A1: No, I am only sharing the 2k version to be nice. Any larger version is something I am not willing to share.
BUT, the easy adapt psd I use to fix my facial skin for friends can be downloaded, it is makes 100% sense to me .
But perhaps to nobody else.

A2: Send me your face skin, I will adapt it. May take a day. Then I am willing to share bigger quality.
[/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP(B) 7BASE CBBE Vanillaby [b]Maevan2[/b][/url][/center]
author: MassiveMaster
